config.function: if (!context || !context.retrievedDocs) return true; const docContent = context.retrievedDocs.map(d => d.content).join(' ').toLowerCase(); const responseWords = response.toLowerCase().split(/\s+/).filter(w => w.length > 6); const matches = responseWords.filter(w => docContent.includes(w)); return matches.length >= 3 || responseWords.length < 5;
